testcase.classname: US1002 Kullanici ortak adimlari Background ile calistirir
testcase.name: TC05 kullanici amazonda Java aratir
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfasinda........................................passed And kullanici Java icin arama yapar.........................................passed Then sonuclarin Java icerdigini test eder...................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC15 herokuapp'dan delete butonu calismali
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "herokuappUrl" anasayfasinda................................passed And add element butonuna basar..............................................passed And kullanici 3 sn bekler...................................................passed Then Delete butonu gorunur oluncaya kadar bekler............................passed And Delete butonunun gorunur oldugunu test eder.............................passed Then Delete butonuna basar..................................................passed And Delete butonunun gorunmedigini test eder................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
